mapper.select: /* DayMembrMapper.getDayMembrDetail */ SELECT tmm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D ( tmm.MEMBR_NM ) AS MEMBR_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE((SELECT MIN(SALE_DATE) FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_MEMBR WHERE MEMBR_NO = tmm.MEMBR_NO), 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MIN_SALE_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE((SELECT MAX(SALE_DATE) FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_MEMBR WHERE MEMBR_NO = tmm.MEMBR_NO), 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MAX_SALE_DATE, (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = tmm.REG_STORE_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD) AS STORE_NM, (SELECT MEMBR_CLASS_NM FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmm.REG_STORE_CD AND MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD) AS MEMBR_CLASS_CD, tmm.MEMBR_CARD_NO, --카드사용구분 --카드발급횟수 (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD ='055' AND NMCODE_CD = tmm.GENDR_FG) AS GENDR_FG, tmm.WEDDING_YN, (SUBSTR(tmm.BIRTHDAY, 1,4) || '-' || SUBSTR(tmm.BIRTHDAY, 5,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(tmm.BIRTHDAY, 7)) AS BIRTHDAY, (SUBSTR(SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO), 1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO), 4,4) || '-' || SUBSTR(SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO), 8)) AS TEL_NO, tmm.EMAIL_ADDR, (SBPENC.D(tmm.ADDR) || SBPENC.D(tmm.ADDR_DTL)) AS ADDR, tmm.EMAIL_RECV_YN, tmm.SMS_RECV_YN, tmm.REMARK FROM TB_MB_MEMBER tmm WHERE 1=1 AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = #{membrNo}
